Author: colderbytheminute
Text: Same. I used to just restrict - then I got nearer to my GW and I'm now stuck in a perpetual binge-restrict cycle. I restrict on weekdays, then end up binging on weekends. Of course, the weight keeps piling on anyway...and the cycle continues. So many times I thought I was so close to breaking the cycle, only to end up binging. I hate it.
